title: Penny Mordaunt – 2018 Speech at Kenyan Chamber of Commerce
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Penny Mordaunt, the Secretary of State for International Development, at the Kenyan Chamber of Commerce on 19 January 2018.
